resources.string: Enter your username and password below and they will be used to retrieve your token. Your username and password will not be stored, intead the token will be used to authenticate this device to the DNS.com web site. If you should ever need to disable this device\"s access to your account, simple change your token from the DNS.com web site.
Deleting \"[[RECORDNAME]]\" cannot be undone, are you sure you wish to permanently delete it?
The list of domains on the server has changed in size. Would you like to reload the displayed data from the server?
Unable to delete \"[[RECORDNAME]]\". Please try again later or contact support for additional assistance.
Failed to retrieve the auth token for the given username and password. Please check your credentials and contact support if you think you have reached this message in error.
An error occurred trying to communicate with the DNS.com web site. Please check to ensure that your token is valid by going into settings and checking the values.
The required setting "Auth Token" is not currently set. For this application to work, you must have a value for this field.
Choose a domain group to assign this domain to:
An error occurred while attempting to create the new [[RECORDTYPE]] "[[RECORDNAME]]"
Please try again later or contact support if this error continues to happen.
An error occurred while attempting to delete the [[RECORDTYPE]] "[[RECORDNAME]]"
Please try again later or contact support if this error continues to happen.

This application can upload and download large amounts of data from the Internet. This can incur data fees depending on your data plan. If you wish to be warned when you open the application and attempt to use it without being connected to WiFi, please ensure the box below is ticked.
Using This Service May Cost You Money!!!

You are not currently connected to a WiFi network. As such, using this application could incur data usage and/or fees for accessing the Internet. If you do not wish to use data at this time, please exit this application using the button below. If you do not wish to see this message again, click the "Settings" button below.
A delete operation cannot be undone. If you select "OK", this item will be permanently deleted.

Enabling this option will allow this application to synchronize all of your account information even when you are only connected via a cellular network. On some accounts this may only be a little bit of data, but on other accounts this could be a large amount of data over a connection which could cost you money. This option is disabled by default and will only sync when connected via a WiFi network.
This is a background service which attempts to cache as much information as possible from the DNS.com API in a local database for use on the device.

Welcome to the DNS.com authoritative DNS mobile app. This app can use a lot of data the first time that it starts up, so it is recommended that you be connected to WiFi the first time you run this so that you will not only save money, but also get your data stored quicker. If you are not currently on WiFi, you can still use this app, but you may be charged for data usage depending on your cellular plan.\n\nAre you sure you wish to continue right now?
